Hi! I'm an archaeologist turned web-developer-designer, and this blog is where I keep snapshots of my projects as I learn the tools of the trade. Take a look around at my latest projects, and if you like what you see let me know on GitHub!

Development

Design

Metacognition Testing App - Node.js Project

A CRUD application made with Node.js

Git Repository

Purpose

A testing platform for metacognition researchers that require centralized access to metacognition tests, assessments, and cloud data storage for their studies.

Technologies

  • Express.js
  • Express-session
  • MongoDB
  • Mongoose
  • Bootstrap
  • Pug

This project is maintained by AAZWD
